pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, July 11, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with Sun Youth and victims and survivors of violent crime.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of opening remarks

3:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a community leisure centre.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
